metadata.title: CVE-2021-30022 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: There is a integer overflow in media_tools/av_parsers.c in thegf_avc_read_pps_bs_internal in GPAC 1.0.1. pps_id may be a negative number,so it will not return. However, avc->pps only has 255 unit, so there is anoverflow, which results a crash.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
